title: Property Rental Web-app
description: A full-stack MERN application for property rentals, enabling users to browse, book, and manage properties with secure authentication and a seamless user experience.

title: Weather Forecast
description: This project is to showcase the realtime weather update. Here the data is fetched from an api which show data depending upon the location of user. The location is been traced using longitude and latitude of user's location.

title: Employee Data
description: An employee data management system with a tabular display, utilizing browser local storage. Features include image upload, detailed employee records, and a debounced search bar for efficient name and post filtering.

title: Food Delivery
description: A responsive food delivery app built with React.js, featuring dynamic product card summaries for an intuitive user experience.

title: Quiz App
description: This JavaScript-based quiz app is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features hardcoded questions and answers, allowing users to select an answer once, after which other options are disabled. Users can retry the quiz to improve their score.

title: Simple Calculator
description: This project features a dynamic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript interface with an attractive UI. It includes two result containers: one displaying cumulative calculations and another showcasing the latest input values.
